tool_description: Loads customer feedback data from various sources and formats, standardizing it into a consistent structure for analysis.

data_source.description: Path to the feedback data file or data source identifier

data_format.description: Format of the input data: csv, json, xml, or database

text_column.description: Name of the column containing feedback text

timestamp_column.description: Name of the column containing feedback timestamp

customer_id_column.description: Name of the column containing customer identifier

error_messages: Data source not found: Verify the file path or data source identifier exists and is accessible.
Unsupported data format: Use one of the supported formats: csv, json, xml, or database.
Missing text column: The specified text_column does not exist in the data source.
Invalid column specification: Ensure timestamp_column and customer_id_column exist if specified.
Empty dataset: The data source contains no records to process.
usage: Specify data_source, data_format, and text_column. Optionally provide timestamp_column and customer_id_column for enhanced tracking. The tool returns structured feedback records ready for analysis.

feedback_ids.description: Array of unique identifiers for each feedback record

timestamps.description: Array of feedback timestamps in date-time format
